game.name: Anguna - Warriors of Virtue
game.desc: It is a short but exciting action-adventure game, reminiscent of the original Legend of Zelda. Anguna includes: 5 dungeons and a large overworld to explore, Multiple weapons and items including: a sword, bow & arrows, bear traps, dynamite, lantern, magic boots, and more, Many hidden rooms, secrets, and powerups, Lots of interesting enemies and boss monsters

game.name: GEMini
game.desc: Bejeweled style match-3 for the GameBoy Advance.

game.name: Space Twins
game.desc: Very professional and solid platform/puzzle game for Gameboy Advance.

game.name: Uranus
game.desc: First game of "Uranus" serie from ZoneGN. This is a vertical scrolling space shooter. Very good from what I've played (using VisualBoyAdvance), with good graphics, music, and the action was pretty fierce as well.

game.name: Uranus Zero
game.desc: Third game of "Uranus" serie from ZoneGN. This is a vertical scrolling space shooter. Very good from what I've played (using VisualBoyAdvance), with good graphics, music, and the action was pretty fierce as well.

game.name: Uranus Zero EV
game.desc: Third game of "Uranus" serie from ZoneGN, in his "easy version". This is a vertical scrolling space shooter. Very good from what I've played (using VisualBoyAdvance), with good graphics, music, and the action was pretty fierce as well.

game.name: Uranus 2
game.desc: Second game of "Uranus" serie from ZoneGN. This is a vertical scrolling space shooter. Very good from what I've played (using VisualBoyAdvance), with good graphics, music, and the action was pretty fierce as well.

game.name: Waimanu
game.desc:
Waimanu for Gameboy Advance - Planet Earth is threatened by Wekas, evil alien Jellies who invaded the planet with the intent of colonizing it. Daring Waimanu will face them to defend the fate of our planet!
Waimanu can push blocks and make them slide, and sliding blocks can squash Wekas between them. He can also destroy blocks that can't be moved because they're against a wall or if there's another block behind them. Also Wekas can destroy blocks whenever they want to try to reach our hero.
